bill.title: Creating the adoption protection act and updating the Kansas adoption and relinquishment act.
bill.description: Creating the adoption protection act and updating the Kansas adoption and relinquishment act.

history.action: Senate Introduced
Senate Referred to Committee on Financial Institutions and Insurance
Senate Hearing: Tuesday, January 23, 2018, 09:30 AM Room 546-S
Senate Committee Report recommending bill be passed as amended by Committee on Financial Institutions and Insurance
Senate Committee of the Whole - Committee Report be adopted
Senate Committee of the Whole - Be passed as amended
Senate Emergency Final Action - Passed as amended;  Yea: 34 Nay: 5
House Received and Introduced
House Referred to Committee on Financial Institutions and Pensions
House Hearing: Monday, March 05, 2018, 09:00 AM Room 281-N
House Committee Report recommending bill be passed as amended by Committee on Financial Institutions and Pensions
House Committee of the Whole - Committee Report be adopted
House Committee of the Whole - Motion to Amend - Offered by  Representative Hodge
House Committee of the Whole - Amendment by  Representative Hodge was rejected
House Committee of the Whole - Motion to Amend - Offered by  Representative Miller
House  Representative Kelly raised a question of germaneness. The amendment was ruled not germane.
House Committee of the Whole - Be passed as amended
House Final Action - Passed as amended;  Yea: 102 Nay: 22
Senate Nonconcurred with amendments; Conference Committee requested; appointed Senator Longbine , Senator Billinger and Senator Rogers as conferees
House Motion to accede adopted;  Representative Kelly,  Representative Powell and  Representative Finney appointed as conferees
Senate  Senator Estes,  Senator Olson, and  Senator Faust-Goudeau are appointed to replace  Senator Longbine,  Senator Billinger, and  Senator Rogers on the Conference Committee

House  Representative Jennings,  Representative Whitmer, and  Representative Highberger are appointed to replace  Representative Kelly,  Representative Powell, and  Representative Finney on the Conference Committee
Senate  Senator Wilborn,  Senator Lynn, and  Senator Haley are appointed to replace  Senator Estes,  Senator Olson, and  Senator Faust-Goudeau on the Conference Committee

House  Representative Highland,  Representative Humphries, and  Representative Ruiz are appointed to replace  Representative Jennings,  Representative Whitmer, and  Representative Highberger on the Conference Committee
House Conference committee report now available
House Motion to suspend Joint Rule 4 (k) to allow consideration adopted;
House Conference Committee Report agree to disagree adopted;  Representative Highland,  Representative Humphries and  Representative Carmichael appointed as conferees
Senate Motion to suspend Joint Rule 4 (k) to allow consideration adopted;
Senate Conference Committee Report agree to disagree adopted;  Senator Wilborn,  Senator Lynn and  Senator Haley appointed as second conferees
House Conference committee report now available
House Conference Committee Report was adopted;  Yea: 63 Nay: 58
Senate Conference Committee Report was adopted;  Yea: 24 Nay: 15
Senate Enrolled and presented to Governor on Tuesday, May 08, 2018
Senate Approved by Governor on Friday, May 18, 2018

votes.desc: Senate Emergency Final Action - Passed as amended - Yea: 34 Nay: 5
House Final Action - Passed as amended - Yea: 102 Nay: 22
House Conference Committee Report was adopted - Yea: 63 Nay: 58
Senate Conference Committee Report was adopted - Yea: 24 Nay: 15
